description:
Quiet and reserved, Luciana Mazzei has a gentle personality which lies at odds to her all-round athleticism, particularly her talent in marksmanship.
Luciana herself was interested in developing equipment and clothing specifically for witches, but after Fernandia set her sights on Luciana`s skill at shooting, she was forcefully invited into a combat unit, where she has stayed without protest.
Luciana is a theorist with an inquiring mind. Her hobby is sewing. In place of her bureaucracy-illiterate leader, she performs negotiations with and writes reports for the brass, in effect taking up the post of adjutant for the team.
In charge of sniping, support.
name: Luciana Mazzei
